Title: Red Lights
Writer: Georges Simenon (novel), Laurence Ferreira Barbosa, Cédric Kahn, Gilles Marchand
Actors: Jean-Pierre Darroussin, Carole Bouquet, Vincent Deniard, Alain Dion
Plot: Antoine and Helene drive to South France to return their kids from a holiday camp. The traffic is dense and the atmosphere growingly tense; he is an alcoholic and becomes increasingly drunk the more often they stop. After a fierce discussion they split and both have to face great danger during the night.
